DATAFIELD.name: TenSP
DATAFIELD.selector: #event-grid > DIV:nth-of-type(01) > DIV > DIV > DIV.product-info > A > H3

DATAFIELD.name: gIA
DATAFIELD.selector: #event-grid > DIV:nth-of-type(01) > DIV > DIV > DIV.product-info > P > SPAN

DATAFIELD.name: IMG
DATAFIELD.selector: #event-grid > DIV:nth-of-type(01) > DIV > DIV > DIV.product-image.image-resize > A > PICTURE
